security_issues.sample: - Remediação de 5 secrets reais em docs (whsec_FIZOs8... → whsec_[REDACTED])

findings: Potential secret leaks detected in the codebase.
High number of commits may indicate frequent changes, requiring careful review.
A substantial number of test files relative to source files suggests good testing practices, but the revealed secrets pose a risk.
recommendations: Immediately revoke and rotate all leaked secrets.
Implement a secret scanning solution in the CI/CD pipeline to prevent future leaks.
Conduct a thorough security review of the affected code areas.
Educate developers on secure coding practices and secret management.
Enforce stricter access controls on sensitive files and repositories.
